text: Hi everyone! Hope you guys are doing well. I have a question related to the Mailchimp and HubSpot integration. Currently on my account this is setup in such a way that whenever a contact is updated on HubSpot it also updates the values on Mailchimp. This part works fine - however there are cases when - The particular contact does not exist on mailchimp or is deleted on mailchimp or has to resubscribe to get back on mailchimp. And all of these contacts which DO NOT sync show up in the error log (failing). Is there a way I can clear this log or how can I handle these errors?

:sparkles:Slack Tips and Best Practices:sparkles:

To get the most out the HubSpot Developer Slack, follow these best practices:

• Will your post/question potentially help more than one person? Ask in a public channel instead of 1:1 DMs to help as many folks as possible. 
• Thread all replies to keep topics organized and searchable
• Thread followup questions/comments to your original post
• Don't post the same question in multiple channels. If you must, link to your original question in new channels.
More <https://slack.com/blog/collaboration/etiquette-tips-in-slack|great tips here>. Thanks for making the HubSpot Developer Slack easier to use for everyone!
We are having an issue with HubSpot Quote Esignature verification working... The client is say the "buyer" is signing, but it doesn't appear to be updating HubSpot. Any thoughts on this?
